choices: Keep it he wanted you to have it
Sell it to a sane scientist for millions!
1.content:
Mark was at his home in the small town of Greensville, sitting on his couch watching a movie called ATTACK OF THE GIANTS when he heard a knock at his door. When he opened the door, he could see a box with a letter on it. He grabbed up the box bringing it into his home and setting it down on the kitchen table before reading the letter.

"Dear Mark

It's your uncle Vlad. If you are reading this, then I am dead, no dought killed by my rivels in the mad scientist
community. as such, I have left my greatest invention to you, the Shrink Ray! I know you will use it as you see fit.

Love, your uncle Vlad."

Mark was heartbroken! He loved his uncle vary much, apart of him wanting to be a mad scientist himself. He opened the box and looked at its content. And sure enough, you find a gold syfy gun that must be the shrink ray but what to do with it?
1.title: Sade News

11.content: Mark decided to keep it, After all he had a fetish for tiny people and this was the perfect way for him to finally live that fantasy. But then he thought who to use it on first? After all, he had to be vary careful about this or he might be fall prey to his uncle's rivels as well.
11.title: Keep it he wanted you to have it

112.content: He considered it and a stranger was his best option as he did not want to be connected to a disappearance. He had many options for this, he could go to the park and shrink someone out for a jog, or he could order takeout and shrink the one delivering it. He just could not figure out which one would be best.
112.title: A stranger

info.brief_description: A young man named Mark inherits his mad scientist uncles inventions including a shrink ray
